my_kivy.scroll_list¶

Implements ScrollList and LeftStatusIndicatorListItem.

class scroll_list.LeftStatusIndicator(**kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: kivymd.uix.list.ILeftBody, kivy.uix.anchorlayout.AnchorLayout

Contains MDSpinner and MDIcon.

icon[source]¶

ObjectProperty set to MDIcon

spinner[source]¶

ObjectProperty set to MDSpinner.

class scroll_list.LeftStatusIndicatorListItem(**kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: kivymd.uix.list.OneLineAvatarListItem

Contains LeftStatusIndicator as left element.

Depending on loading_state, either the spinner is active or an icon is shown.

loading_state[source]¶

OptionProperty with options ["loading", "queued", "ready"].

spinner[source]¶

ObjectProperty reference to instance of MDSpinner of LeftStatusIndicator.

class scroll_list.ScrollList(**kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: kivy.uix.scrollview.ScrollView

Scrollable List whose items are constructed as instances of item_type from item_dicts.

Automatically updates upon change of item_dicts.

callback[source]¶

ObjectProperty

item_dicts[source]¶

ListProperty containing the dictionaries from which the items are constructed.

item_type[source]¶

ObjectProperty constructor for items.

items[source]¶

ListProperty containing the constructed items.

list[source]¶

ObjectProperty set to MDList. Contains the items.

on_item_dicts(self, *_)[source]¶

Construct items from item_dicts using item_type.

class scroll_list.TestApp(**kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: kivymd.app.MDApp

Application class, see module documentation for more information.

Events
on_start:

Fired when the application is being started (before the runTouchApp() call.

on_stop:

Fired when the application stops.

on_pause:

Fired when the application is paused by the OS.

on_resume:

Fired when the application is resumed from pause by the OS. Beware: you have no guarantee that this event will be fired after the on_pause event has been called.

Changed in version 1.7.0: Parameter kv_file added.

Changed in version 1.8.0: Parameters kv_file and kv_directory are now properties of App.

build(self)[source]¶

Initializes the application; it will be called only once. If this method returns a widget (tree), it will be used as the root widget and added to the window.

Returns

None or a root Widget instance if no self.root exists.
